description: Immaculate 4-bedroom family home at The Lexington. This secure, one-time adult-oriented (no age restrictions!) complex has been meticulously maintained by residents. 3,000 + sq ft of living space on 3 levels~this townhouse feels like a single-family, detached home without the price tag! 4 BDRMS, 3 FULL BATHS + powder room, media room with projector & 110' screen (included!), DOUBLE-CAR Garage, fenced-in back yard & patio for pets. New roof 2025, electrical upgrade w/new heat pump, EV-ready, separate hwt in kitchen, 2 gas fireplaces, utility room for extra storage of tools & seasonal items. 4-minute walk to transit, Cloverdale Athletic Park, 4-minute drive to AJ McLellan Elementary, Crescent Heights Academy, Northview Golf Club. 15 min to Willowbrook Shopping & Langley Events Centre
